text: Uss aurat ney jiss kay ghar mein yousuf thay yousuf ko behlana phuslana shuroo kiya kay woh apney nafs ki nigrani chor dey aur darwazay band ker kay kehney lagi lo aajao. Yousuf ney kaha Allah ki panah! Woh mera rab hai mujhay uss ney boht achi tarah rakha hai. Bey insafi kerney walon ka bhala nahi hota
